full_text: A quick knit for small decorative pumpkins for your home. A beginner friendly knit - techniques needed are knit, purl, cast on and cast off. Free pattern with full instructions and images on how to sew your pumpkin together. These are a small quick knit which look nice in a group. Knitted using a thicker yarn for speed, ease and texture. Finished item is approx. 7cm wide x 5.5cm high (7cm including stalk) 2.5 inches wide x 2 inches high (2.75 inches including stalk) Made using Red Heart Super Saver Yarn which is Aran weight (worsted weight, medium) and 4.5mm needles. Yellow pumpkin completed using chunky yarn on 5mm needles. Uses a small amount of stash yarn. A fun quick knit for a small display for the Autumn/Fall/Halloween season.
name: Ravelry: Decorative Pumpkins Quick Knit pattern by creative neats
